archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: CRM Lite
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Web Front End to Microsoft CRM, developed by RBI/ATG, used for data processing and event management. Registrations taken from UWE public website uses Cereus. E.g. lecture series, short course. Users are internal CRM staff, reads a database of registrations captured from public web. Converts the registrations - creates or updates the contact in CRM 2011, which is common across the different 'business units' use of CRM 2011. Also provides an easier end user interface. Manages duplicate contacts.
